com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class AbstractWSelectList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WBeanComponent
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractInput
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWSelectList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanAware, BeanBound, BeanProviderBound, DataBound, Disableable, Input, Mandatable, WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractWMultiSelectList, AbstractWSingleSelectList

    public abstract class AbstractWSelectList
extends AbstractInput
    AbstractWSelectList provides the basis for components that allow the user to select an item from a list.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                           boolean allowNoSelection)
        Creates an AbstractWSelectList.
        Parameters:
        options - the list's options.
        allowNoSelection - if true, allow no option to be selected

      • AbstractWSelectList

        public AbstractWSelectList(Object lookupTable,
                           boolean allowNoSelection)
        Creates an AbstractWSelectList.
        Parameters:
        lookupTable - the lookup table identifier to obtain the list's options from.
        allowNoSelection - if true, allow no option to be selected

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowNoSelection

        protected boolean isAllowNoSelection()
        Returns:
        if true, allow no option to be selected

      • setSubmitOnChange

        public void setSubmitOnChange(boolean flag)
        Setting this flag to true will cause this list component to post the form to the server when it's selection is changed.
        Parameters:
        flag - if true, the form is submitted when the selection changes.

      • isSubmitOnChange

        public boolean isSubmitOnChange()
        Indicates whether the form should submit to server when the list component's selection changes.
        Returns:
        true if the form is submitted when the selection changes.

      • setDescEncode

        public void setDescEncode(boolean encode)
        A flag if set to true the option description will be encoded. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        encode - If true, option descriptions will be encoded.

      • getDescEncode

        public boolean getDescEncode()
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if option descriptions are to be encoded.

      • optionToCode

        public final String optionToCode(Object option)
        Retrieves the code for the given option. Will return null if there is no matching option.
        Parameters:
        option - the option
        Returns:
        the code for the given option, or null if there is no matching option.

      • optionToCode

        protected String optionToCode(Object option,
                              int index)
        Retrieves the code for the given option. Will return null if there is no matching option.
        Parameters:
        option - the option
        index - the index of the option in the list.
        Returns:
        the code for the given option, or null if there is no matching option.

      • getOptionIndex

        protected int getOptionIndex(Object option)
        Retrieves the index of the given option. The index is not necessarily the index of the option in the options list, as there may be options nested in OptionGroups.
        Parameters:
        option - the option
        Returns:
        the index of the given option, or -1 if there is no matching option.

      • getListCacheKey

        public String getListCacheKey()
        Retrieves the data list cache key for this component.
        Returns:
        the cache key if client-side caching is enabled, null otherwise.

      • optionToString

        protected String optionToString(Object option)
        This method converts an option object into a string. List components that need to control the format of the string can override this method. By default this method simply calls toString() on the given option object.
        Parameters:
        option - the option to return a String representation of.
        Returns:
        a String representation of the given option.

      • getOptions

        public List<?> getOptions()
        Returns the complete list of options available for selection for this user's session.
        Returns:
        the list of options available for the given user's session.

      • setOptions

        Set the complete list of options available for selection for this user's session.
        Parameters:
        aList - the list of options available to the user.

        Set the complete list of options available for selection for this users session.

      • setLookupTable

        public void setLookupTable(Object lookupTable)
        Set the lookupTable for this user's session.
        Parameters:
        lookupTable - the lookup table identifier to obtain the options for the list.

      • getLookupTable

        public Object getLookupTable()
        Get the lookupTable for this user's session.
        Returns:
        the lookupTable for the options

      • setEditable

        @Deprecated
protected void setEditable(boolean editable)
        Deprecated. Editable no longer required. WSuggestions and a WTextfield should be used instead
        Sets whether users are able to enter in an arbitrary value, rather than having to pick one from the list. This method is marked protected, as not all list type controls will support editing. Controls which do support editing should override this method and make it public.
        Parameters:
        editable - true for editable, false for fixed.

      • isEditable

        @Deprecated
protected boolean isEditable()
        Deprecated. Editable no longer required. WSuggestions and a WTextfield should be used instead
        Indicates whether users are able to enter in an arbitrary value, rather than having to pick one from the list. This method is marked protected, as not all list type controls will support editing. Controls which do support editing should override this method and make it public.
        Returns:
        true if the user can enter arbitrary values, false if not.

      • isAjax

        protected boolean isAjax()
        Indicates whether this component is AJAX enabled. A list is an AJAX list if it has a target set.

        This method is protected due to this being an abstract class and not all the classes that extend it support AJAX.

        Returns:
        true if this list is AJAX enabled, false otherwise.

      • getAjaxTarget

        protected AjaxTarget getAjaxTarget()
        Retrieves the default AJAX target.

        This method is protected due to this being an abstract class and not all the classes that extend it support AJAX.

        Returns:
        the default AJAX target for this list.

      • setAjaxTarget

        protected void setAjaxTarget(AjaxTarget ajaxTarget)
        Sets the AJAX target for the list. If a target is supplied, as an AJAX request is made rather than a round-trip to the server. The AJAX response will only contain the (possibly updated) target element rather than the entire UI.

        This method is protected due to this being an abstract class and not all the classes that extend it support AJAX.

        Parameters:
        ajaxTarget - the AJAX target.

      • isPresent

        protected boolean isPresent(Request request)

        Indicates whether this list was present in the request.

        Lists that allow no option to be selected have a hidden input field, whose name is name-h to indicate that it is in the request.

        Overrides:
        isPresent in class AbstractInput
        Parameters:
        request - the request being responded to.
        Returns:
        true if this list was present in the request, false if not.

      • preparePaintComponent

        protected void preparePaintComponent(Request request)
        Override preparePaintComponent to register an AJAX operation if this list is AJAX enabled.
        Overrides:
        preparePaintComponent in class AbstractWComponent
        Parameters:
        request - the request being responded to.

      • isSelectionOrderable

        protected boolean isSelectionOrderable()
        Indicates whether the selection be ordered.
        Returns:
        true if the selection can be ordered, false otherwise.

      • newComponentModel

        protected AbstractWSelectList.SelectionModel newComponentModel()
        Creates a new SelectionModel which holds Extrinsic state management of the list.
        Overrides:
        newComponentModel in class AbstractInput
        Returns:
        a new SelectionModel

      • getComponentModel

        protected AbstractWSelectList.SelectionModel getComponentModel()
        Returns the effective component model for this component. Subclass may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getComponentModel in class AbstractInput
        Returns:
        the effective component model

      • getOrCreateComponentModel

        protected AbstractWSelectList.SelectionModel getOrCreateComponentModel()
        Retrieves the model for this component so that it can be modified. If this method is called during request processing, and a session specific model does not yet exist, then a new model is created. Subclasses may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getOrCreateComponentModel in class AbstractInput
        Returns:
        the model for this component

      • getDesc

        public String getDesc(Object option,
                      int index)
        Retrieves the description for the given option. Intended for use by Renderers.
        Parameters:
        option - the option to retrieve the description for.
        index - the option index.
        Returns:
        the description for the given option.

        Retrieves the code for the given option. Intended for use by Renderers.

        index - the option index.
        Returns:
